faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Find answers to common questions about Flowtify and our services

what.question: What is Flowtify?
what.answer: Flowtify is an AI-powered workflow automation platform that helps businesses streamline their processes, reduce manual work, and improve productivity through intelligent automation and integration.

how.question: How does it work?
how.answer: Flowtify uses a visual workflow builder where you can drag and drop elements to create automated processes. Our AI engine then optimizes these workflows and provides real-time analytics and insights.

benefits.question: What are the main benefits?
benefits.answer: Key benefits include increased productivity, reduced errors, faster process execution, better visibility into operations, cost savings, and the ability to focus on strategic tasks instead of repetitive work.

pricing.question: What are the pricing plans?
pricing.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans starting from $29/month for small teams, with enterprise solutions available for larger organizations. All plans include core features with additional capabilities based on your needs.

trial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start your trial, and you can upgrade or cancel at any time.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancellation.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

support.question: What support do you offer?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive support including live chat, email support, video tutorials, documentation, and dedicated customer success managers for enterprise customers.

training.question: Do you provide training?
training.answer: Yes, we offer onboarding sessions, training webinars, and custom training programs for teams. Our customer success team ensures you get the most value from Flowtify.

onboarding.question: What's included in onboarding?
onboarding.answer: Onboarding includes initial setup, workflow design consultation, team training, and ongoing support to ensure successful implementation and adoption.

security.question: How secure is my data?
security.answer: We implement enterprise-grade security including SOC 2 compliance, end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and role-based access control to protect your data.

integrations.question: What integrations do you support?
integrations.answer: We support 100+ integrations including popular tools like Slack, Notion, Salesforce, HubSpot, and many more. We also offer custom API integration for specific needs.

scalability.question: Can it scale with my business?
scalability.answer: Yes, Flowtify is built to scale from small teams to enterprise organizations. Our platform handles increased workloads and users without performance degradation.

information-collection.title: Information We Collect
information-collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, company information, and usage data.

how-we-use.title: How We Use Your Information
how-we-use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

information-sharing.title: Information Sharing
information-sharing.content: We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, with your consent, or when required by law. We maintain strict data protection standards with all partners.

data-security.title: Data Security
data-security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. Your data is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel.

your-rights.title: Your Rights
your-rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of certain communications and request data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.
